SpellDef.Description: Summon a wave that does 8 damage (+2 per water shard) to 3 adjacent enemies.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Summon a wave that does %d damage to 3 adjacent enemies.

SpellDef.Description: A bolt of night strikes the victim doing 10 damage and reducing their Spell Resistance by 5 (+1 per level).
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: A bolt of night strikes the victim doing 10 damage and reducing their Spell Resistance by %d.

SpellDef.Description: A bolt of night strikes the victim doing 10 damage and reducing their Spell Resistance by 5 (+1 per level).
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: A bolt of night strikes the victim doing 10 damage and reducing their Spell Resistance by %d.

SpellDef.Description: All allied units gain 50% Cold Resistance. Hexed units only gain +25%.
All allied units gain 50% Fire Resistance. Hexed units only gain +25%.
25% of the damage done to the target is reflected back on his attacker.
A gust of wind blows 3 adjacent enemies next to the caster back a tile and, unless they resist, knocks them prone.
Summons a fog that blurs your units and improves their Dodge by 3 (+1 per water shard) and an additional 3 (+1 per air shard) vs missile attacks.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Summons a fog that blurs your units and gives them +%d to Dodge and an additional +%d vs missile attacks.

SpellDef.Description: Target city is crippled with an unnatural coldness slowing stationed units and reducing their Initiative by 3.
Target city produces 25% more food per Essence.
All allied units have their Defense raised by 5 (+2 per earth shard).
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: All allied units have their Defense raised by %d.

SpellDef.Description: Random Fire Storms plague the city weakening stationed units (-1 Hit Point per unit). Additional casts will increase the effect.

Does 8 (+2 per Level) Lightning damage to all units in a line 5 tiles long.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Does %d Lightning damage to all units in a line 5 tiles long.

SpellDef.Description: Does 12 fire damage (+2 per death and fire shard) (+9 if target is Hexed) to the unit, half if the victim resists.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Does %d fire damage to the unit, half if the victim resists. If the unit is killed an inferno is left in the tile.

SpellDef.Description: Units within range are knocked prone unless they resist.

SpellDef.Description: Allows the targeted Champion to be able to cast Thunderstrike. Can only be cast on one Champion at a time.
Allows the targeted Champion to be able to cast Shockwave. Can only be cast on one Champion at a time.
Allows the targeted Champion to be able to cast Fireball. Can only be cast on one Champion at a time.
Allows the targeted Champion to be able to cast Pandemonium. Can only be cast on one Champion at a time.
Allows the targeted Champion to be able to cast Heal. Can only be cast on one Champion at a time.
Allows the targeted Champion to be able to cast Drain Life. Can only be cast on one Champion at a time.
Target unit gains +1 counterattack, +10 Dodge and +4 Hit Points regenerated per round.

GameModifier.Provides: +1 Counterattack with any melee weapon
+10 to Dodge

SpellDef.Description: +3 Attack when damaging an enemy with a melee attack
Unit gains +2 Initiative immediately, then +3 Attack whenever they damage an opponent with a melee attack. Unit also loses 1 Hit Point each round.

GameModifier.Provides: Unit loses 1 Hit Point each round
+2 to Initiative
Unit gains 3 Attack whenever they damage an opponent with a melee attack

SpellDef.Description: All allied units gain 75% Fire Resistance. Hexed units only gain +50%.
All allied units gain 75% Cold Resistance. Hexed units only gain +50%.
All allied units gain +20 Spell Resistance.
Target unit gains +1 Defence per level of the caster.
Target unit gains +1 Defence per level of the caster.

Grants +40% Spell Damage, +10 Spell Mastery, +40% mana cost for 2 turns.

GameModifier.Provides: +40% Spell Damage
+10 Spell Mastery
+40% mana cost for tactical spells
